LowPro Updated for Firefox 3.5

Firefox 3.5 was recently released, and offers significant updates. If you have not upgraded yet, you should do so now.

In the LowPro community, we have been tracking compatibility with the upcoming Firefox. The existing LowPro was compatible with Firefox 3.5RC2, but incompatible with the final release of Firefox 3.5.

So, if you are using LowPro, you should upgrade with a new version of LowPro today.

You can either go for Dan Webb’s original version or try out my minification-friendly fork (there is a minified version in dist).
